newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: NWE oil products - gas oil steady, others gain.
newsitem.headline: NWE oil products - gas oil steady, others gain.

text.p: NWE oil products opened mixed on Thursday, gas oil was steady from opening losses while mogas and fuel oil offers rose, dealers said.
Gasoline was offered at around $206 fob Rotterdam, following a fob ARA deal at $202.
Fuel oil talk was around $85/$86, a gain of $1 a tonne, with one trading house looking to pick up material.
Heating oil, meanwhile, recovered opening losses in line with futures. Offers clung to around IPE June +$1.50 fob Rotterdam, but German buyers, who had covered some shorts on Wednesday, kept away.
